name: React (Hanna Andersson)
description:
This game is in early stage of development. Please feel free to comment update-ideas, buggs etc.

React is a funny drinking game where you  test your reflexes and speed of your brain. The winner of each game gets to give away 3 zipps to any player.  You can be up to 4 players, but no less than 2.

Controls:

  • Player one - q
  • Player two - p
  • Player three -z
  • Player four - m

If the controls are not working, make sure caps lock is off.

Click on the player button when the statement is true:

  • Math - when the number is correct
  • Drink - when the drink is half full or more
  • Rocket - when you see the rocket

When a player has an empty glass, the player has earned 3 give-away zipps. 

Coming up soon:

  • More games
  • Design updates
